nodes.text: TR-4018 was a male stormtrooper of the First Order. He served under Major Kander Varak at a bacta production plant on Tevel, guarding warehouse four along with TR-1004, where Varak was keeping Tevellan children imprisoned so that the adults of the species would work for him. While on a mission to Tevel, Resistance operative Finn entered the warehouse inside the casing of a gonk droid, tricking the guards into letting him inside the building.
